Promoting SustainableIndustrialization (SDG9) involves technological innovation & economic diversification, crucial for developing countries. The successful collaboration between UNIDO & Peru in applying the DIVE (Diversifying Industries and Value Chains for Exports) tool is an impressive example of an innovative partnership, generating concrete & actionable evidence for informed decision-making.
